extendedInfo.description: Burt Destruction is an action packed side scrolling platformer. Join Burt against the evil Yeti, as he goes out on a killing spree, stomping on ugly wicked manimals, punching down fat fairies and beating the evil Yeti who has obnoxious plans to use a ray gun to turn the entire world into hairy beasts and monsters. The more wicked the beast will go; the more bold Burt will grow.Burt Destruction is a free to download 4 star rating adventure game with 0.5 million downloads on iOS.FEATURES OF THIS PLATFORMER:Â§  Fully animated cinematics to guide you through Burt's epic adventure.Â§  Awesome Platformer Action with simple and intuitive controls.Â§  In-game tutorials at each stepÂ§  Innovative wicked creatures and hilarious voice oversÂ§ Upgrade your character with power-ups and allies to unleash even more destruction!Â§  Hidden Artifacts, missions and fights on the intense Difficulty ModesÂ§  Unlock Crazy Costumes and play as Ninja Burt, Zombie Burt, or Cupid Burt!More:The little dynamite Burt will chase Dr. Dodoâs vision to stop Yetiâs wicked plan of domination. Will the world turn out to be hairy as the evil dominator Yeti wishes or will it be BURT who will be the ultimate champion? Mind it, the chase for survival is not as easy when Evil Yeti is full of rage. Watch out Yeti and his wicked troops conspiring against Burt and his ally Big foot. The ultimate tally of rage and anger compounds the essential characteristic of Burt with the power destruction gene. The giant Burt can dodge any beast with his power pack punch. Big foot: Burtâs ally of all time enfolds some of the most amazing fun. Burt with Big foot will flip Yeti and his wicked world upside down. Jump into the bold and crazy world of Burt, Burt Destruction takes you through an adventurous journey of good, bad, wicked and evil. Crush evil enemies and fight for your survival with thrilling animated sequences and the popular big Burt smack. Dodge the manimals, chase your goal and sprint through this roller-coaster life of Burt. And during this rage-filled journey, Burtâs allies - Bigfoot and Dr. Dodo, swoop in for some bold and dynamite action, causing a little destruction of their own. Witness how Burt sprints over Yetiâs vision to be an evil wicked dominator.What you must know!If you have spent your childhood going gaga over platformers like Mario games, Yoshi's Island, Pacman, Donkey Kong, Giana Sisters, Girby, Lode Runner, Contra and more, then Burt Destruction is a platformer game that you will vouch for!

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Fun game, nice graphics and good sound.  Very entertaining, love the gameplay.  Thanks
reviews.author: Joycler Coleman

reviews.title: Cool art
reviews.comment: Good game, with lot of objectives and cool art style. Worth a try for someone who has huge interest in adventurous games.
reviews.author: Rita Williams

reviews.title: Fantastical!
reviews.comment: Even the minutest of the characters are beautifully taken care off. Bigfoot, fat fairies and other animals are fantastic. Deep work..
reviews.author: Dina Sorel

reviews.title: Fantabulous!
reviews.comment: Fantastic + fabulous makes it Burt Destruction. :)

reviews.title: Nailed it.
reviews.comment: Just entered the yeti coast! Found it pretty easy till this level. Between! Story, graphics and gameplay is fabulous.
